thread.title: Matt Damon Stays Miraculously Dry On Disneyland's Matterhorn Ride
thread.title_full: Matt Damon Stays Miraculously Dry On Disneyland's Matterhorn Ride

author: Suzy Strutner
title: Matt Damon Stays Miraculously Dry On Disneyland's Matterhorn Ride
text:
Matt Damon Stays Miraculously Dry On Disneyland's Matterhorn Ride We'd wait in line with him any day. Suzy Strutner Associate Lifestyle Editor, The Huffington Post Posted: 08/20/2015 05:19 PM EDT | Edited: 3 minutes ago 
Leave it to Matt Damon to defy Disneyland. 
Damon is one of many celebrities who frequently visit the park in Anaheim, California. His trip on Thursday included a spin on one of our favorite rides -- the Matterhorn Bobsleds -- during which he managed to stay totally dry. Because he's Matt Damon. And he's perfect. Duhh. George Savvas/Disneyland Resort 
Spotting someone famous at a Disney park isn't as uncommon as you'd think . 
Some of the most notable visitors include the stars below. î€‡
